Happy Memories
Castle Grounds, Conway, Caernarvonshire Prizes - 1st £10.10s., 2nd £5.5s., 3rd £2.2s. March contest - 1st(£2.2s.) Penmaenmawr, 2nd Conway. 3rd annual contest promoted by Conway Tabernacle Methodist Church. 5 bands competed.
Sept. 17, 2013, 1:56 p.m. Dec. 31, 2018, 1:17 p.m.
1 Wrexham Brass Charles Bennett
2 Conwy Town David Williams
3 Llanberis Silver Harry Heyes
